name: LV DAMIER AZUR CANVAS ARTSY GM *LARGE SIZE* (BRAND NEW & NEVER USED)
description:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PLEASE READ ENTIRE DESCRIPTION AND ALL DETAILS PRIOR TO PURCHASING !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Please be aware and advised this is the LARGER SIZE of this bag style and in the artsy. It's huge!!!!!!

***THIS IS A HIGH QUALITY REPLICA BAG, WE ARE NOT SELLING OR CLAIMING IT TO BE AUTHENTIC. IF YOU PURCHASE THIS BAG YOU ARE ACKNOWLEDGING THAT YOU ARE AWARE AND UNDERSTAND THAT IS A REPLICA AND THAT IT IS NOT AN ORIGINAL FROM THE RESPECTIVE LABEL NAME STORE. YOU ARE ALSO ACCEPTING AND ACKNOWLEDGING IT TO BE A FINAL SALE AT TIME OF PURCHASE WITH NO REFUND, EXCHANGE, OR RETURN***

Capture the spirit of Bohemian Chic with the generous ARTSY GM. In a supple and refreshing Damier Azur Canvas. Exquisite detailing of its ornate carefully crafted leather braided arched handle adds a delightful touch along with the bag charm that hangs freely from the front of the bag.

- (Width x Height x Depth) 19.69 x 9.84 x 14.17 (measurements are approximate)

- Natural Oxidizing Leather Trim and Handle

- Golden Brass pieces and bag charm that can also be used as a key hanger.

- 6 interior patch pockets large enough for a zippy wallet and 1 additional long zipped pocket

- D-RIng for keys and accessories.

- Soft Microfiber Linining

-Protective Bottom Studs (feet)

*****BAG IS BRAND NEW AND NEVER CARRIED. NO RIPS, TEARS, OR STAINS, PATINA HAS NOT BEGUN YET ON THE LEATHER AND BRAIDED HANDLE IS NOT STIFF AND EASY TO CARRY. BAG DOES COME IN DUST BAG AS PICTURED*****

SHIPPING:
SHIPS SAME DAY IF PURCHASED BY 2:00pm EST AND NEXT BUSINESS DAY IF PURCHASED AFTER 2:00pm EST. ARRIVES IN 2-4 BUSINESS DAYS WITH TRACKING INFORMATION INCLUDED AND PROVIDED AT TIME OF SHIPMENT.

description:

The collection features women's boots, sandals, pumps, flats and a variety of handbags. Luichiny is perfect for the woman who wants her independence and wants to get noticed in the outside world at an affordable price.

Sole Boutique Women's Girls Nite Shoe. Sole Boutique Girls Nite Shoe in BLACK with metallic studs. This rebellious heel from Sole Boutique with a little black dress and you’re sure to have all eyes on you, or at least your sexy feet. These heels are made for partying - are you ready? ***FITS A WOMENS SIZE RANGE OF 9.5 - 10M***
(size 11M runs 1 size small) 

Synthetic
Synthetic sole
Heel measures approximately 4.5"
Manufactured by Sole Boutique.
A brand-new, unused, and unworn item (including handmade items) in the original packaging (such as the original box or bag) and/or with the original tags attached. Shipped Via USPS Priority with 2-3 Business Day Delivery anywhere in the United States.
